resources.string: You love coffee. We love coffee. Let\'s get together.
Need us? Call or Come find us.
Hours: Mon-Sat: 7 AM - 9 PM | Sun: 9 AM - 6 PM
Summer Hours: Mon-Sat: 7 AM - 6 PM | Sun: 9 AM - 6 PM
Address: 106 E. Main Street | Starkville, MS 39768
Fresh pastries daily & lunch 11am-2pm Mon-Fri. Catering & event rental options upon request.
